title: Leonardo DiCaprio, 44, and girlfriend Camila Morrone, 22, enjoy rare date night
text:
Leonardo DiCaprio treated his younger girlfriend Camila Morrone to a date night at San Vicente Bungalows in West Hollywood on Monday.

The actor, 44, and Camila, 22, took time out to enjoy a romantic dinner as she continues to blaze a promotional trail for Mickey and the Bear, in which she plays the titular character.

Leo cut a casual figure in a black hoodie and baseball cap, while Camila looked effortlessly stylish in a long white midi dress and leather jacket.

Romantic: Leonardo DiCaprio treated his younger girlfriend Camila Morrone to a date night at San Vicente Bungalows in West Hollywood on Monday

The model teamed her chic a-line dress with black strappy heels and wore her brunette locks in a sleek straight centre-parting.

The couple made a low-key entrance before heading outside to chat to pals.

Camila has had a busy week promoting drama Mickey and the Bear, in which she had garnered praise for her 'star-making' performance.

Low-key: Leo cut a casual figure in a black hoodie and baseball cap, while Camila looked effortlessly stylish in a long white midi dress and leather jacket

The young beauty plays the titular character, Mickey Peck, a teenager living with her drug addled father in Montana.

The film is set in the heart of opioid country and sees the title character struggle to care for her Veteran father as he battles addiction while living a teenage life.

Sensitive scenes between the young girl and her struggling parent are intercut with flashes of what looked like an attempt at a normal high school life in the gritty trailer.

Casually-clad: Leo cut a low-key figure as he chatted to pals outside San Vicente Bungalows

Leonardo and Camila have been dating since around December 2017, but only appeared to confirm their romance last year with a string of public outings.

It was then that there was that the Django Unchained star was finally getting ready to settle down.

A source told US Weekly last November the couple were 'very serious' and 'everyone is saying that marriage could be soon for them.'

'They’ve talked about getting engaged,' with the source adding that Leonardo is now even, 'ready to have kids.'

The pair have since attended a number of high-profile events together, including Leo's Once Upon A Time In Hollywood Cannes Film Festival premiere. However they walked the red carpet separately.

They were seen together at Ellen Degeneres' 60th birthday party in LA in January 2018, as well as the Coachella Festival a few months later, where they were spotted cosying up during Eminem's set.

A star is born: Camila captivating in the trailer for her upcoming drama, Mickey and the Bear, which was released by the studio on Tuesday

Leonardo even enjoyed a holiday to Colorado with Camila, joining his close pal and Great Gatsby co-star Tobey Maguire.

Just last month the star was seen trying to make a sneaky exit from a sushi date with Camila, trying to conceal his face after the low-key outing.

The Revenant Oscar winner has dated a string of models since becoming an international star thanks to his role as Jack in 1997's Titanic.
description: Leonardo DiCaprio treated his younger girlfriend Camila Morrone to a date night at San Vicente Bungalows in West Hollywood on Monday.
